p.s: I have heard that the book The Hate U Give which we have finished reading in our English class recently was banned from school libraries in your school district some time ago.
This is a real shame in my opinion because the book is trying to spread a very important and relevant message.
It's pointing out issues that we currently have with racism all over the world and especially in the US and that people need to stand up for equality and their freedom.

I can understand that the offensive language, the sexual references, the depicted drug use and the vulgar content are not apropriatedappropriate for especially younger people, so I would suggest you to rather make this a 16+ book rather than banning it all together.

The negative depiction of the police is not a good reason to ban this book in my opinion because the things adressed in this book are realities and things we cannot close our eyes on by banning a piece of literature, especially because we really need to adress these isuesissues and changchange something about that.
I hope I was able ot change your mind of the ban and see the book from a different perspective.
